sourcesContent:
import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Breadcrumb, { BreadcrumbItem } from "../../components/Breadcrumb"; import Layout from "../../components/Layout"; export default function ShoppingCart(){ return( Home Shopping Cart
{/* Heading */}

Shopping Cart

{/* List group */}
  • {/* Image */}
    {/* Title */}
    Cotton floral print $40.00
    {/* Text */}

    Size: M
    Color: Red

    {/*Footer */}
    {/* Select */} {/* Remove */} Remove
  • {/* Image */}
    {/* Title */}
    Suede cross body Bag $49.00
    {/* Text */}

    Color: Brown

    {/*Footer */}
    {/* Select */} {/* Remove */} Remove
{/* Footer */}
{/* Coupon */}
{/* Input */}
{/* Button */}
{/* Button */}
{/* Total */}
  • Subtotal $89.00
  • Tax $00.00
  • Total $89.00
  • Shipping cost calculated at Checkout *
{/* Button */} Proceed to Checkout {/* Link */} Continue Shopping
{/* FEATURES */}
{/* Item */}
{/* Icon */} {/* Body */}
{/* Heading */}
Free shipping
{/* Text */}

From all orders over $100

{/* Item */}
{/* Icon */} {/* Body */}
{/* Heading */}
Free returns
{/* Text */}

Return money within 30 days

{/* Item */}
{/* Icon */} {/* Body */}
{/* Heading */}
Secure shopping
{/* Text */}

You're in safe hands

{/* Item */}
{/* Icon */} {/* Body */}
{/* Heading */}
Over 10,000 Styles
{/* Text */}

We have everything you need

) }
